1243020.name: War Thunder - British Beginner's Pack
1243020.description:
This Pack includes:

  • Cromwell Mk.V (RP-3) rocket tank (Rank 2 Great Britain);
  • Avenger Mk II bomber (Rank 2 Great Britain);
  • 120000 Silver Lions;
  • Premium Account for 7 days.

Cromwell Mk.V (RP-3)

The Cromwell Mk.V (RP-3) medium tank was created in 1946 in only a single vehicle , based on the Cromwell Mk.V. It had decent armour and good mobility, a 600-hp engine allowed the tank to reach a maximum speed of up to 50 km/h. The Cromwell RP-3 comes armed with a 75 mm gun with a coaxial 7.92 mm machine gun, and is also equipped with four 152 mm rockets, placed in pairs on each side of the turret. Initially, these rockets were developed to fight submarines and transport ships, but were also used against ground targets and lightly-armoured vehicles.

Avenger Mk II

The Avenger Mk II is a british torpedo bomber, developed by the US and initially known as the TBF-1 Avenger. These aircraft were delivered to Britain under a Lend-Lease program in 1943. The main armament consists of two 12.7 calibre M2 Browning machine guns, mounted on the wings of the aircraft. As for defensive armament, it consists of one 12.7 mm machine gun in the dorsal turret and one 7.62 mm machine gun in the ventral turret. The Avenger Mk II is capable of carrying up to four 500 pound bombs, or one 2216 pound Mk13 torpedo.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
1243020.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 简体中文, 俄语*, 日语*, 波兰语*, 捷克语*, 土耳其语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
